name: Exhausted
content:
Exhausted

Source CRB.276

Related @Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.bPDAhCFEP5Jvybhg]{Conditions}

You move at half speed, you can’t run or charge, and you take a –3 penalty to your Armor Class, attack rolls, melee damage rolls, thrown weapon damage rolls, Reflex saving throws, initiative checks, and Strength- and Dexterity-based skill and ability checks. The amount of bulk you can carry without becoming @Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.OwZA6flUQPH0jPA0]{Encumbered} is reduced by 3. After 1 hour of complete rest, you instead become @Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.JGFn4MrDZ6X5vrzU]{Fatigued}.
